price: Kandi icyo muzatanga cyose mu bitangwa cyangwa mugahiga (umuhigo), rwose Allah aba abizi. Kandi inkozi z’ibibi ntizizigera zibona abazitabara.
arabic: وَمَآ أَنفَقۡتُم مِّن نَّفَقَةٍ أَوۡ نَذَرۡتُم مِّن نَّذۡرٖ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعۡلَمُهُۥۗ وَمَا لِلظَّٰلِمِينَ مِنۡ أَنصَارٍ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wamā anfaqtum min nafaqatin aw nadhartum min nadhrin fa-inna al-laha yaʿlamuhu wamā lilẓẓālimīna min anṣārin
